description: This Wireless LAN Adapter will allow your Wifi Enabled Samsung Home Entertainment devices to access Wifi connectivity. Adapter is compatible only with Samsung BD Players, HES, LCD, LED and PDP TVs with SAMSUNG SMART TV, AllShareTM OR InfoLink capability. Supports IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n and Samsung AllShare. Extension cable included.Compatibility:Samsung BD Players and Home Entertainment Systems:•    2012: HT-E4500•    2011: BD-D5250C, BD-D5500C, HT-D5210C•    2010: BD-C5500, HT-C5500•    2009: BD-P1600, BD-P1590, BD-P1590C, HT-BD1250, HT-BD1200, HT-BD8200Samsung LCD, LED and PDP TVs:•    2011:o    LCD: D550 and aboveo    LED: D5500~D6450o    PDP: D490 and D550•    2010:o    LCD: C560, C650 and aboveo    LED: C6400 and aboveo    PDP: C6400, C6500, C7000 and above
title: Samsung WIS12ABGNX Wireless LAN Adapter
